description: Describes Audio Flow additional and extensible attributes defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Audio Flow resource

bit_rate.description: Bit rate, in kilobits/second. Integer value expressed in units of 1000 bits per second, rounding up.

level.description: Level. Indicates constraints on parameters of the coding tools that are in use, as defined for the Flow media type.

profile.description: Profile. Indicates the subset of coding tools that are in use, as defined for the Flow media type.

urn:x-matrox:layer.description: Audio sub-Flow layer of within a fully-described mux

urn:x-matrox:layer_compatibility_groups.description: Indicates the compatibility groups to which this sub-Flow belongs.
